tool_description: Retrieves historical and current weather observations from meteorological stations and satellite data for specified coordinates and time ranges.

start_time.description: Start time for data retrieval (UTC, ISO 8601)

end_time.description: End time for data retrieval (UTC, ISO 8601)

data_source.description: Preferred data source: station, satellite, reanalysis

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time, and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps.
Unsupported variable: Requested weather variable is not available. Use standard variables like temperature, humidity, pressure, wind_speed.
No data available: No weather data found for the specified location and time range. Try a different location or time period.
Invalid data source: Use one of [station, satellite, reanalysis].
usage: Specify coordinates, time range, and desired weather variables. Optionally choose a data_source preference. Returns time-series weather observations.

timestamps.description: Array of ISO 8601 timestamps for observations
